alert.note: Alert for Keith; Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 10:47AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Keith and northwestern Lincoln Counties through 1130 AM CDT/1030 AM MDT/... At 1046 AM CDT/946 AM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sarben, or 23 miles east of Ogallala, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sutherland and Sutherland Reservoir State Recreation Area around 1105 AM CDT. Hershey around 1120 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Coker, O`Fallons and Birdwood. This includes the following highways... Highway 97 between mile markers 8 and 15. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 146 and 172. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
